name: LLoris Morgan
description: I believe in Honesty, Communication and Definitely, Honestly but Tactfully & respectfully, expressing what I feel. A girl may feel intimidated. My woman would know & allow that I’m expressing myself, awaiting Her opinion on what WE should do, so that WE can reach a conclusion together and more than 50 of the time 9/10s I compromise, because I’m that much into wanting to make MY Relationship work from My Friend to my Lover/Companion/Wife.
